sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react" import {minutesToDuration} from "./utils/duration" export default function Controls({focus, breakTime, setFocus, setBreak, isTimerRunning}) { function focusIncrease() { isTimerRunning ? false : (focus === 60 ? false : setFocus(focus + 5)) } function focusDecrease() { return isTimerRunning ? false : (focus === 5 ? false : setFocus(focus - 5)) } function breakTimeIncrease() { return isTimerRunning ? false : (breakTime === 15 ? false : setBreak(breakTime + 1)) } function breakTimeDecrease() { return isTimerRunning ? false : (breakTime === 1 ? false : setBreak(breakTime - 1)) } return(
Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(focus)}
Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(breakTime)}
) }
